name: The Castle (itch) (Arto1017)
description:
The locals speak of a mysterious being that lives inside of the nearby castle, and everyone who has went inside has never returned.  So you decided to find out yourself. In this short first person narrative you are a young hooligan who has broken into the castle! You follow the trail of someone who has already searched the castle but has yet to return. You have to solve small puzzles and read notes to find out why nobody has returned and also to learn if the legends are true. This is my first completed game so feedback would be appreciated!  Everything was made and coded by me except for the textures, fonts, icons, and sounds.
